Description: Sir Corbett Men Black Semiformal Shoes
Reviews:
["Though it looked nice when it was delivered, but the product comes out to be of poor quality.
Just within 3 months of purchasing, the shoe got teared at the sole, something that never happened with other branded shoes (like redtape) I used in recent past.

I am not a person who has to run or walk a lot during the day, just going to office in morning by own car and returning in evening. Little bit of walk within same floor... that's all about my physical activity. Not good from health's point of view but very good for shoes.

I expect my shoes to last at least a year. Not happy with this product, won't purchase form this brand, neither would recommend others.

Abhik Das", 'Quality of shoe is good for the price. Sir Corbett has never disappointed in that. The toe end of the shoe seems a little tight for my usual size. So will suggest to buy a size larger than usual. ', "Size is accurate and quality is so good. This is my first order from Myntra and with this experience I'm going to order many things from Myntra only. Thanks for the before time delivery in this difficult time ?"]
